name: The Return of Sammy Marlo
overview: This text adventure and its sequel, Dial M for Marlo were released in Loadstar magazines, this one published in both Loadstar #223 and Loadstar #246. Our favorite hard-boiled PI is back in a great text adventure and it is YOU! Sammy Marlo, distant cousin to Phillip Spade, returns to seek out clues and solve a mind-numbing mystery. That is, you do. You find the clues and put together the evidence. You make the collar, or you get in trouble with the cops.
